name: The Dreading Knight
description:
You are just a knight facing down ghosts and monsters. And your only ally is a dice that may surprise you by the powers it will give you. Hope you can survive the experience.

Instructions:

X or J for Attack.

Space for Jumping.

Arrow keys or WASD for movement.

Creators:

Code: https://barioidl.itch.io/

Art: https://olivalu.itch.io/

Music: https://renattocomposer.itch.io/

SFX: Agent_Ghostjr
